Interface Shape

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractShape, Circle, Delta, Tee

    public interface Shape
    This interface contains all the basic methods that every shape should have.
    Version:
    01/19/12
    Author:
    Chun-Wei Chen

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.Color getColor()
      Returns the Color of the Shape.
      boolean isOn(int x, int y)
      Returns true if the point (x, y) is on the Shape.
      boolean isSelected()
      Returns true if this Shape is selected.

      Moves the Shape to the specified point.

      Sets the Color of the Shape.

      Sets this Shape to be selected.

      String representation of the Shape.

      • isOn

        boolean isOn(int x,
           int y)
        Returns true if the point (x, y) is on the Shape.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the point
        y - the y-coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        true if the point (x, y) is on the Shape.

        Sets the Color of the Shape.

      • shiftBy

        void shiftBy(int deltaX,
           int deltaY)
        Shifts the Shape by a specified amount.
        Parameters:
        deltaX - the difference between the initial x-coordinate and the new x-coordinate
        deltaY - the difference between the initial y-coordinate and the new y-coordinate

      • moveTo

        void moveTo(int newX,
          int newY)
        Moves the Shape to the specified point.
        Parameters:
        newX - the new x-coordinate of the Shape
        newY - the new y-coordinate of the Shape
